messages.messageBody:
http://www.localconnect.net/~kmeg/kaminari/

Here's a good link on making functional armor that can serve as a starting
place -
you can use www.kabutographics.com as a method to get to the Clan Kaminari
web site.

I used information from several sources including Master Effinghams site and
the
above to make both display and list legal japanese armor.

Thanks to both for providing the info on the web.

Regards,
Kyostti
Coy. Rakehells
